attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: His stubborn anger will see nothing stop him.
Just with a mere thought, he can manipulate the flames to burn even hotter and longer, while requiring less of his own energy to sustain it.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Piercing Bolts of Burning Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flame Storm Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The wind flows through me. It controls me!
Against the undead, Luther's fills the mens hearts with fire and light!

effects.description:
Leadership: +3 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Stand firm men, that which is dead may still burn.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +2 per turn
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: His spells are like infernos, leaving nothing but ash and cinders in their wake. His enemies quickly learn to fear the searing heat of his magic.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You don't want to be on the wrong side of this one's ire – it's explosive to say the least!
